articles.author: GianCarlo Canaparo
articles.title: GianCarlo Canaparo: Pelosi powerless to delay Trump impeachment trial if Senate does THIS
articles.description: The Senate should not let Pelosi interfere with its constitutional obligations or independence.
articles.content:
Now that the House has impeached President Trump, all eyes turn to the Senate. According to Article 1 of the Constitution, what happens next is a trial there to determine if the president should be removed from office.
But House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, D-Calif… [+2705 chars]

articles.author: Victor Garcia
articles.title: Comedian Whitney Cummings tells Conan an intern reported her to HR for saying 'Merry Christmas'
articles.description: Comedian Whitney Cummings told late-night host Conan O'Brien Wednesday that she was reported to Human Resources last year for saying "Merry Christmas" to an intern.
articles.content:
Comedian Whitney Cummings told late-night host Conan O'Brien Wednesday that she was reported to Human Resources last year for saying "Merry Christmas" to an intern.
Cummings told O'Brien and co-host Andy Richter that the most stressful part of the holidays w… [+1508 chars]

articles.author: Louis Casiano
articles.title: Boxer Adrien Broner ordered to pay $830G in sex-assault claim
articles.description: Adrien Broner, the four-time world boxing champion whose recent legal troubles have overshadowed his ring exploits, was ordered Tuesday to pay $830,000 to a woman who accused him of sexually assaulting her at a Cleveland nightclub.
articles.content:
Adrien Broner, the four-time world boxing champion whose recent legal troubles have overshadowed his ring exploits, was ordered Tuesday to pay $830,000 to a woman who accused him of sexually assaulting her at a Cleveland nightclub.

articles.author: Christopher Carbone
articles.title: Chimps create 'rock music' by throwing stones at trees, study reveals
articles.description: Scientists have seen Chimpanzees creating "music" -- that includes hooting and throwing rocks at trees -- but then walking away.
articles.content:
Scientists have seen chimpanzees creating "music" -- that includes hooting and throwing rocks at trees -- then walking away.
Primatologists from the Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology in Germany have conducted some of their own experiments, m… [+1592 chars]

articles.title: Senate and House leaders battle over next steps in impeachment process
articles.description: Nancy Pelosi says she will not name impeachment managers until she knows more about how the Senate will conduct a trial; reaction and analysis from the 'Special Report' All-Stars.

articles.author: Sam Dorman
articles.title: USPS faces lawsuit for blocking private vendors from making stamps with religious content
articles.description: The law firm First Liberty is suing the United States Postal Service (USPS), alleging that it maintains an unconstitutional regulation prohibiting Americans from requesting custom stamps that include religious content.
articles.content:
The law firm First Liberty is suing the United States Postal Service (USPS), alleging that a rule prohibiting Americans from requesting custom stamps with religious content is unconstitutional.
“This regulation by the USPS not only chills speech, it silences… [+2309 chars]

articles.author: Greg Gutfeld
articles.title: Gutfeld on the impeachment
articles.description: It doesn't feel like we're being impeached. It's because they call it "impeachment lite."
articles.content:
It didn't feel like we're being impeached. It's because they call it "impeachment lite."
No surprise: the impeachment vote was as lopsided as a chipmunk's face with a toothache.
"I don't know about you, but I'm having a good time. It's crazy," President Tru… [+2077 chars]

articles.author: Bradford Betz
articles.title: Philadelphia man accused of shooting 6 officers in hourslong standoff hit with 62 new charges
articles.description: A man accused of shooting six police officers during an eight-hour standoff in a north Philadelphia suburb earlier this year was hit Thursday with 62 new sets of charges, prosecutors say.
articles.content:
A man accused of shooting six police officers during an eight-hour standoff in a north Philadelphia suburb earlier this year was hit Thursday with 62 new charges, prosecutors say.
